Rooms.Name: Hundreds of Feet Below the Surface

Objects.Name: obsidian gauntlets
Objects.Description: A pair of obsidian gauntlets have been left here.

Objects.Name: obsidian girth
Objects.Description: An obsidian girth has been left here.

Objects.Name: blackstone amulet
Objects.Description: A shining black amulet has been dropped here.

Objects.Name: blackfire staff
Objects.Description: A staff glowing with a black fire has been abandoned here.

Objects.Name: black leggings
Objects.Description: A pair of black leggings have been left here.

Objects.Name: mucus aboleth
Objects.Description: A slimy pile of mucus lies on the ground.

Objects.Name: pile gray slime
Objects.Description: A pile of gray slime lies disgustingly on the floor.

Objects.Name: aboleth's treasure
Objects.Description: The aboleth's treasure gleams brightly.

Objects.Name: small pile guano
Objects.Description: A small pile of guano is on the floor of the cave.

Objects.Name: eyestalk tentacle
Objects.Description: An eyestalk tentacle lies severed on the ground.

Objects.Name: bugbear hide
Objects.Description: A bugbear hide lies stinking in a heap.

Objects.Name: shining mace
Objects.Description: A shining mace polished to a high sheen has been dropped here.

Objects.Name: chrome hammer
Objects.Description: A chrome hammer has been left here.

Objects.Name: jeweled spear
Objects.Description: A jeweled spear has been abandoned here.

Objects.Name: pile slippery shifting coins
Objects.ShortDescription: a pile of slippery shifting coins
Objects.Description: A pile of slippery shifting coins lies here in the center of the floor.

Objects.Name: tentacle deepspawn
Objects.Description: A tentacle of the DeepSpawn has been left here.

Objects.Name: maroon dragon scale
Objects.Description: A maroon dragon scale has been left here.

Objects.Name: deep gem
Objects.Description: The Deep Gem has been dropped here.

Objects.Name: dragon's claw
Objects.Description: A dragon's claw has been left here.

Objects.Name: jaws feyr teeth
Objects.Description: A terrible set of fanged teeth have been left here.

Objects.Name: nightmare feyr
Objects.Description: An awful nightmare has been left on the ground.

Objects.Name: gargoyle's horn
Objects.Description: A severed horn has been left here.

Objects.Name: gray wings of flight
Objects.Description: A pair of leathery, gray wings have been left here.

Objects.Name: suit stone skin
Objects.Description: A suit of stone skin lies on the floor.

Objects.Name: festering wart
Objects.Description: A festering wart has been lopped off a margoyle's nose.

Objects.Name: short gibberling sword
Objects.Description: A short gibberling sword lies in the dirt.

Objects.Name: cloth eyeshade
Objects.Description: A filthy cloth eyeshade has been left here.

Objects.Name: cloven hoof
Objects.Description: A cloven hoof has been sperated from its leg.

Objects.Name: metal scale hide
Objects.Description: A huge metal scale hide has been left here.

Objects.Name: blood gorgon capilary
Objects.Description: A small capilary full of the blood of a gorgon has been left here.

Objects.Name: enormous battle axe
Objects.Description: An enormous battle axe has been left here.

Objects.Name: grimlock's helm
Objects.Description: An odd-shaped helm has been left here.

Objects.Name: hideous hook hand
Objects.Description: A hideous-looking hook hand has been left on the floor.

Objects.Name: tough exoskeleton
Objects.Description: A tough exoskeleton lies on the ground.

Objects.Name: moldy topknot
Objects.Description: A moldy topknot lies severed from some poor sod's head.

Objects.Name: poisoned spore blade
Objects.Description: A strange blade made of some sort of fungus lies here.

Objects.Name: russet mold
Objects.Description: A lump of russet mold lies on the floor.

Objects.Name: budding spore
Objects.Description: A budding spore grows from one corner of the room.

Objects.Name: water cascade fall water
Objects.Description: A cascade of water runs down the south wall into a crack in the floor.

Objects.Name: sconced torch
Objects.Description: A sconced torch glows brightly on the wall.

Objects.Name: stewpot
Objects.Description: A stewpot full of foul-smelling meat rests over a small fire.

Objects.Name: torch ornate sconce
Objects.ShortDescription: a torch in an ornate black sconce
Objects.Description: A torch glows from an ornate black sconce.

Objects.Name: black rock throne
Objects.Description: A carved black rock throne rests against the east wall.

Objects.Name: gibberling leg
Objects.Description: A gibberling leg has been left here.

Objects.Name: eye bat
Objects.Description: The eye of a bat has been dropped on the floor.
